div.bibl: Domashnii Vrach (The House Physician), Vol. II, No. 4, April 1917, pp. 194-195 Statement of the Ownership, Management, Circulation, etc.,

body.p: The House Physician, published monthly, at 1346 S. Halsted Street, Chicago, Ill., for April 1st, 1917.
Business Manager, A. A. Ostroff, 1346 S. Halsted St., Chicago, Ill.
(Give names and addresses of individual owners, or, if a corporation, give its and the names and addresses of stockholders owning or holding 1 per cent or more of total amount of stock.)
Henry R. Krasnow, M. D., 1346 S. Halsted St., Chicago, Ill.
Known bondholders, mortgagees, and other security holders owning or holding 1 per or more of total amount of bonds, mortgages, or other securities are: (If there are one, so state.)
(Signature of editor, publisher, business manager, or owner.)
Sworn to and subscribed before me this Second day of April, 1917.
